snippet: Brendan D. Ross, the driver of a U-Haul truck that struck and killed a woman in a tailgating area at the Yale-Harvard football game in 2011, turned himself in on Friday night.
abstract: Brendan D Ross, driver of truck that struck and killed Nancy Barry in tailgating area of Yale-Harvard football game in 2011, is charged with misdemeanor negligent homicide with a motor vehicle.
lead_paragraph: Brendan D. Ross, the driver of a U-Haul truck that struck and killed a woman in a tailgating area at the Yale-Harvard football game in 2011, turned himself in on Friday night.

headline.seo: Yale Student Arrested in Fatal Crash at Tailgating Party
headline.main: Yale Student Arrested in Death at Tailgating Party
headline.print_headline: Yale Student Arrested in Death at Tailgating Party
